title: New: Slaptop – Remember
body:
Drawing you in with it’s initial electronic ambiance, _Remember_, the new track from San Francisco based producer **Slaptop** is quite the intriguing listen.

But it’s the grooving bassline and vocals reminiscent of Cut Copy that really seals the deal, leading the track into it’s driving dance floor filling climax. This is where the track stays, it’s repeating rhythms swirling you up in it’s euphoric haze. This isn’t just any old deep house track though as it’s pop sensibilities allow it to nestle itself in the back of your head. Stream it below:

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
